Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC=25 µg/ml), Lactococcus lactis (MIC=3 µg/ml), Listeria innocua (MIC=25 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=12.5 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=50 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=12.5 µg/ml), Streptococcus uberis (MIC=12.5 µg/ml).(Ref.2)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed by the skin dorsal glands.

Literature.Title: Novel uperin peptides from the dorsal glands of the australian floodplain toadlet Uperoleia inundata.
Literature.Author: Bradford AM, Raftery MJ, Bowie JH, Tyler MJ, Wallace JC, Adams GW, Severini C.

Literature.Title: New antibiotic uperin peptides from the dorsal glands of the australian toadlet Uperoleia mjobergii.
